projects.name: SMARTLOCK - Ổ KHÓA THÔNG MINH
projects.description: Built an IoT system including a smart lock combined with smartphone usage for unlocking and other utility features such as creating temporary passcodes, updating firmware, locking doors, alerting for unusual signs, and tracking unlock history.

projects.name: APP ĐẶT VÉ XEM PHIM
projects.description: Developed an Android application for online movie ticket booking, including features like viewing showtimes, movie details, booking tickets, seat selection, payment, saving booking history, and ratings.

projects.name: APP QUẢN LÝ SINH VIÊN
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Android application for student information management, including adding, deleting, editing student information, viewing timetables, tracking student learning paths, and viewing lecturer teaching schedules.

projects.name: WEBSITE BÁN HÀNG
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website with typical functions such as viewing order details, purchasing, adding to cart, viewing product information, payment, and a separate Admin website for product updates.

projects.name: TASMANA-PHẦN MỀM QUẢN LÝ CÔNG VIỆC
projects.description: Implemented a comprehensive Work Management system, including Employee Management and Work Tracking, managing information for each member in different departments, coordinating work, and maintaining a central database.
